product.product_body: Our Hindley Picnic Table is made from recycled plastic. Recycled plastic looks similar to wood but that's where the similarity ends. As well as being environmentally friendly it has the following benefits: The Hindley Picnic Table provides ample seating for eight adults and is designed for domestic or commercial use. It is perfect for the home, hotels, pubs, residential care homes, leisure facilities, parks and public areas. Unlike wood it will not stain or rot and can be left outside over winter with no ill effects. It can be cleaned and restored to its as new condition with a simple wipe over.
